p: Pischke et al. (2012) stated that the HEV prevalence in 274 heart transplant recipients was 11.3% [ 120]. Ribavirin and not interferon-Î± is the best therapeutic option as the latter may induce rejections. Ribavirin is effective in clearing HEV infection [ 121, 122], although more dosage studies are warranted; lower doses make the treatment ineffective whereas higher doses may cause anemia.
